endpoints.description: Retrieve aggregated data on consumer habits related to non-durable household items.
Submit consumer feedback on specific non-durable household products.
Get inventory usage patterns and projections for better stock management.
Analyze sales data trends for household goods.
Request detailed insights into emerging consumer trends.
Obtain metrics showcasing the popularity scores of various items.
Receive recommendations for inventory adjustments based on data analysis.
Compare usage statistics of specific household items.
Generate custom reports tailored to specific criteria and datasets.
View satisfaction rates from retailers regarding product availability.
